documentation: deduplicated list of sorries, for each unique goal string the most recent inclusion date is chosen

debug_info.goal:
ν : ℝ → ℝ
ν_supp : support ν ⊆ Icc (1 / 2) 2
ContDiff1ν : ContDiff ℝ 1 ν
ν_nonneg : ∀ x > 0, 0 ≤ ν x
ν_massOne : ∫ (x : ℝ) in Ioi 0, ν x / x = 1
c_close : ℝ
c_close_pos : c_close > 0
h_close :
  ∀ (X : ℝ),
    3 < X →
      ∀ (ε : ℝ),
        0 < ε → ε < 1 → 2 < X * ε → ‖SmoothedChebyshev ν ε X - ↑(ChebyshevPsi X)‖ ≤ c_close * ε * X * Real.log X
ε_main C_main : ℝ
ε_main_pos : 0 < ε_main
C_main_pos : 0 < C_main
h_main : ∀ ε ∈ Ioo 0 ε_main, ‖MellinTransform (fun x => ↑(Smooth1 ν ε x)) 1 - 1‖ ≤ C_main * ε
A C_bnd : ℝ
C_bnd_pos : 0 < C_bnd
A_in_Ioc : A ∈ Ioc 0 (1 / 2)
zeta_bnd : LogDerivZetaHasBound A C_bnd
holo1 :
  ∀ (T : ℝ),
    3 ≤ T →
      HolomorphicOn (fun s => deriv riemannZeta s / riemannZeta s) (Icc (1 - A / Real.log T ^ 9) 2 ×ℂ Icc (-T) T \ {1})
σ₂' : ℝ
σ₂ : ℝ := max σ₂' (1 / 2)
σ₂_pos : 0 < σ₂
σ₂_lt_one : σ₂ < 1
holo2 : HolomorphicOn (fun s => deriv riemannZeta s / riemannZeta s) (uIcc σ₂ 2 ×ℂ uIcc (-3) 3 \ {1})
c₁ : ℝ
c₁pos : c₁ > 0
hc₁ : ∀ (ε : ℝ), 0 < ε → ε < 1 → ∀ (X : ℝ), 3 < X → ∀ {T : ℝ}, 3 < T → ‖I₁ ν ε X T‖ ≤ c₁ * X * Real.log X / (ε * T)
c₂ : ℝ
c₂pos : 0 < c₂
hc₂ :
  ∀ (X : ℝ),
    3 < X →
      ∀ {ε : ℝ},
        0 < ε →
          ε < 1 →
            ∀ {T : ℝ},
              3 < T →
                let σ₁ := 1 - A / Real.log T ^ 9;
                ‖I₂ ν ε T X σ₁‖ ≤ c₂ * X / (ε * T)
c₃ : ℝ
c₃pos : 0 < c₃
hc₃ :
  ∀ (X : ℝ),
    3 < X →
      ∀ {ε : ℝ},
        0 < ε →
          ε < 1 →
            ∀ {T : ℝ},
              3 < T →
                let σ₁ := 1 - A / Real.log T ^ 9;
                ‖I₃ ν ε T X σ₁‖ ≤ c₃ * X * X ^ (-A / Real.log T ^ 9) / ε
c₅ : ℝ
c₅pos : 0 < c₅
hc₅ : ∀ (X : ℝ), 3 < X → ∀ {ε : ℝ}, 0 < ε → ε < 1 → ‖I₅ ν ε X σ₂‖ ≤ c₅ * X ^ σ₂ / ε
c₇ : ℝ
c₇pos : 0 < c₇
hc₇ :
  ∀ (X : ℝ),
    3 < X →
      ∀ {ε : ℝ},
        0 < ε →
          ε < 1 →
            ∀ {T : ℝ},
              3 < T →
                let σ₁ := 1 - A / Real.log T ^ 9;
                ‖I₇ ν ε T X σ₁‖ ≤ c₇ * X * X ^ (-A / Real.log T ^ 9) / ε
c₈ : ℝ
c₈pos : 0 < c₈
hc₈ :
  ∀ (X : ℝ),
    3 < X →
      ∀ {ε : ℝ},
        0 < ε →
          ε < 1 →
            ∀ {T : ℝ},
              3 < T →
                let σ₁ := 1 - A / Real.log T ^ 9;
                ‖I₈ ν ε T X σ₁‖ ≤ c₈ * X / (ε * T)
c₉ : ℝ
c₉pos : c₉ > 0
hc₉ : ∀ {ε : ℝ}, 0 < ε → ε < 1 → ∀ (X : ℝ), 3 < X → ∀ {T : ℝ}, 3 < T → ‖I₉ ν ε X T‖ ≤ c₉ * X * Real.log X / (ε * T)
c₄ : ℝ
c₄pos : 0 ≤ c₄
Tlb₄ : ℝ
Tlb₄bnd : 3 < Tlb₄
hc₄ :
  ∀ (X : ℝ),
    3 < X →
      ∀ {ε : ℝ},
        0 < ε →
          ε < 1 →
            ∀ {T : ℝ},
              Tlb₄ < T →
                let σ₁ := 1 - A / Real.log T ^ 9;
                ‖I₄ ν ε X σ₁ σ₂‖ ≤ c₄ * X * X ^ (-A / Real.log T ^ 9) / ε
c₆ : ℝ
c₆pos : 0 ≤ c₆
Tlb₆ : ℝ
Tlb₆bnd : 3 < Tlb₆
hc₆ :
  ∀ (X : ℝ),
    3 < X →
      ∀ {ε : ℝ},
        0 < ε →
          ε < 1 →
            ∀ {T : ℝ},
              Tlb₆ < T →
                let σ₁ := 1 - A / Real.log T ^ 9;
                ‖I₆ ν ε X σ₁ σ₂‖ ≤ c₆ * X * X ^ (-A / Real.log T ^ 9) / ε
C' : ℝ := c_close + C_main
C'' : ℝ := c₁ + c₂ + c₈ + c₉
C''' : ℝ := c₃ + c₄ + c₆ + c₇
c : ℝ := sorry
cpos : 0 < c
C : ℝ := sorry
εx : ℝ → ℝ := fun x => Real.exp (-c * Real.log x ^ (1 / 10))
Tx : ℝ → ℝ := fun x => Real.exp (2 * c * Real.log x ^ (1 / 10))
eventually_εx_lt_one : ∀ᶠ (x : ℝ) in atTop, εx x < 1
eventually_2_lt : ∀ᶠ (x : ℝ) in atTop, 2 < x * εx x
eventually_T_gt_3 : ∀ᶠ (x : ℝ) in atTop, 3 < Tx x
eventually_T_gt_Tlb₄ : ∀ᶠ (x : ℝ) in atTop, Tlb₄ < Tx x
eventually_T_gt_Tlb₆ : ∀ᶠ (x : ℝ) in atTop, Tlb₆ < Tx x
eventually_σ₂_lt_σ₁ : ∀ᶠ (x : ℝ) in atTop, σ₂ < 1 - A / Real.log (Tx x) ^ 9
eventually_ε_lt_ε_main : ∀ᶠ (x : ℝ) in atTop, εx x < ε_main
⊢ ∀ᶠ (x : ℝ) in atTop, 1 ≤ Real.log x
